title: Defending Node Applications from SQL Injection, XSS, & CSRF Attacks
author: Codecademy
description: By completing this course, you will have learned how to start protecting your Node.js web application from SQL Injection, Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), and Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Attacks. You will also learn safer JavaScript coding practices as well as the basics of Remediation and Incident Response. After completing this course, you will know how to make your Node.js and Express applications safer from malicious actors.
